item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: Cool books D. Acemoglu - Introduction to Modern Economic Growth [link] Cool websites Search engine: DuckDuckGo Opinion blog (Italian): Wittgenstein Best Italian online newspaper: ilPost Cool apps LaTeX editor: TeXShop Reference manager: BibDesk Messaging app: Signal Two-Factor authentication: Tofu Window manager: Rectangle OCR to LaTeX: Mathpix
